dialogue.author: Mia Wallace:
dialogue.text: Uncomfortable silences. Why do we feel its necessary to yak about bullshit in order to be comfortable?

dialogue.author: Vincent Vega:
dialogue.text: I dont know. Thats a good question.

dialogue.author: Mia Wallace:
dialogue.text: Thats when you know you found somebody really special. When you can just shut the fuck up for a minute, and comfortably share silence.
